library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
library(rsconnect)
library(BBmisc)
library(Rttf2pt1)
library(emmeans)
library(estimability)
library(extrafont)
library(extrafontdb)
library(ggeffects)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(kableExtra)
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
library(countrycode)

# Define the UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Suicide Rates by Country"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput(inputId = "year",
                  label = "Select a year:",
                  choices = unique(suicide_final$year)),
      selectInput(inputId = "sex",
                  label = "Select a sex:",
                  choices = c("Both", "Male", "Female"))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      leafletOutput(outputId = "map", height = 600)
    )
  )
)

# Define the server
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  # Filter the data based on the inputs
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    data <- subset(suicide_final, year == input$year)
    if (input$sex != "Both") {
      data <- subset(data, sex == input$sex)
    }
    data$iso3c <- countrycode(data$country, "country.name", "iso3c")
    lat_long <- data.frame(country = unique(data$country),
                           iso3c = unique(data$iso3c))
    lat_long$lat <- countrycode(lat_long$iso3c, "iso3c", "latitude")
    lat_long$long <- countrycode(lat_long$iso3c, "iso3c", "longitude")
    data <- merge(data, lat_long, by = "country")
    data
  })
  
  # Add the leaflet map
  output$map <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet() %>%
      addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
      setView(lat = 0, lng = 0, zoom = 2) %>%
      addPolygons(data = filtered_data(),
                  fillColor = ~colorQuantile("YlOrRd", sui)(sui),
                  fillOpacity = 0.7,
                  weight = 1,
                  highlight = highlightOptions(
                    weight = 3,
                    color = "white",
                    fillOpacity = 0.9,
                    bringToFront = TRUE
                  ),
                  label = ~paste0(country, "<br> Suicides: ", sui)) %>%
      addLegend("bottomright", 
                title = "Suicide Rate", 
                colors = colorQuantile("YlOrRd", sui)(seq(0, max(suicide_final$sui), length.out = 5)), 
                labels = formatC(colorQuantile(sui, seq(0, max(suicide_final$sui), length.out = 5)), 
                                 format = "e", 
                                 digits = 1),
                opacity = 0.7)
  })
}

# Run the app
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
